title: Lindsey Vonn stuns at Great Sports Legends Dinner To Benefit The Buoniconti Fund To Cure Paralysis
text:
She's brought home two gold medals for alpine skiing.

And Lindsey Vonn shone as bright as her honors on Monday as she modeled a striking satin dress in a light yellow color at the Legends Reception during the 34th Annual Great Sports Legends Dinner To Benefit The Buoniconti Fund To Cure Paralysis at the New York Hilton Midtown.

The 34-year-old former Olympian paired her look with minimal jewelry including a thin pendant necklace, an emerald ring, a glittering wristwatch and strappy sandals with a heel.

Glow: Lindsey Vonn shone as bright as her honors on Monday as she modeled a striking satin dress in a light yellow color at the Legends Reception during the 34th Annual Great Sports Legends Dinner To Benefit The Buoniconti Fund To Cure Paralysis at the New York Hilton Midtown

She made her eyes pop with a dusting of peachy shadow with flecks of gold and heavy black eyeliner.

Lindsey kept her snow blonde tresses pressed straight and allowed them to cascade down her back.

Her appearance comes a couple of weeks after People reported that she would be selling her Vail, Colo. home to move in with her fiancé P.K. Subban.

Gorgeous: The 34-year-old former Olympian paired her look with minimal jewelry including a thin pendant necklace, an emerald ring, a glittering wristwatch and strappy sandals with a heel

Pretty: She made her eyes pop with a dusting of peachy shadow with flecks of gold and heavy black eyeliner

Champs: Lindsey posed with boxer Vladimir Klitschko at the event, who wore a suit with a t-shirt underneath

'She has actually purchased a home in New Jersey with her fiancé P.K. Subban who plays for the New Jersey Devils,' her rep told the outlet.

'Since she is now retired from professional skiing, she is spending more time there to be close to him while he is in season.'

Several other famous faces were in attendance, including baseball superstar Derek Jeter, boxing champ Vladimir Klitschko, TV personality Hoda Kotb, and basketball icon Dwyane Wade.

Coupled: Derek attended alongside his wife Hannah Davis Jeter, who wore a black bodycon dress with a sweetheart neckline

Derek attended alongside his wife Hannah Davis Jeter, who wore a black bodycon dress with a sweetheart neckline.

Vladimir mixed business with pleasure in a navy suit he wore with a white tee and sneakers.

Hoda stood out in a bright red pantsuit that featured a sleeveless top with a halter neckline.

Sharp: Vladimir mixed business with pleasure in a navy suit he wore with a white tee and sneakers

Dwyane was dapper in a grey suit that he paired with a crisp white shirt underneath.

The 34th Annual Great Sports Legends Dinner is helmed by injured ex-footballer Marc Buoniconti and raises funds to support the groundbreaking spinal cord and brain injury research being done by researchers at The Miami Project to Cure Paralysis, a Center of Excellence at the University of Miami Miller School of Medicine, according to a statement.
